channel.title: Drift on TOR Visualization
channel.description: Recent content in Drift on TOR Visualization

item.title: Feature Drift
item.description:
I have reached a point where our selected clusters, identified through cluster characterization (using Z-score and RBM_avg), yield a set of relays (by fingerprint) for drift analysis.

Drift in this context means tracking how the top three Z-score features of each relayâ€™s cluster evolve across timepoints. An important element of this process is using the RBM (Restricted Boltzmann Machine) to detect transitions. For example, we can spot when a relay moves from low RBM energy (routine) to high RBM energy (anomalous), or vice versa.
